title: 100sim
author: 100sim
content: https://100sim.com/There are 100000 + online numbers. We add new numbers weekly, or more often. There is no regular period of time when we add new numbers.Use foreign numbers from more than 180 countries all over the world，including the UK, Russia, Sweden, Germany, Ukraine, France, India and others.You can use a free number to receive sms online, or rent a exclusive number for 10 minutes or hours, days and weeks.The price is very cheap.You can activate more services with virtual number or non VoIP number.Such as Discord、Naver、Instagram、Nike、WhatsApp、Telegram and so on.A Very Simple, Yet Effective interface，reliable API that can be easily used to Verify Accounts through SMS,Bulk SMS verification is possible.Anyone can learn more about SMS verification from our FAQ. If you still have questions,  Email us or chat with online customer service.

comments.author: 100sim
comments.body: It takes a lot of money to develop and operate a website. We need to operate for a long time.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: @100simYou mentioned previously we could also rent an exclusive number for a certain period of time, but I had no luck finding such a thing on your website and even your FAQ area contradicts that claim!- You might want to remove that part from OP if it no longer exists.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Rate seem to be cheaper than that of a trusted service I used sometime back. The only problem perhaps is trusting your service at the moment.It looks like you have some typo under the FAQsWere you trying to mean physical?
